title: #65b: Refinancing the Loan Zone (Andrew Themeles)
itunes:title: Refinancing the Loan Zone with Andrew Themeles - Part 2
description: Andrew Themeles and I get way deeper into this conversation about what he saw leading up to the loan scandal in this country. We got interrupted by almost everyone on Sunset but still managed to make it through. Get the first part first and then listen to this one.
